Our Team

Victor Torres

Biography

Vic is a former software engineer who now runs a consulting firm, FoxGrowth, that helps companies set up their automated marketing infrastructure by leveraging the most current marketing technologies.

If you like the design of this website, feel free to contact him for some work at victor@foxgrowth.com.

Background

  • W.P. Carey School of Business at Arizona State
  • Software Engineer at AdRoll
  • Growth Engineer at Datadog
  • Co-Founder at FoxGrowth

Interests

  • Golf
  • Hiking
  • College Football
  • Travel

Victor currently lives in Manhattan, New York but is a Bay Area native. In his spare time he can be found enjoying the outdoors, playing sports, and learning new languages and skills.
